results.title: [Use of carvidilol in patients with hypertensive disease associated with ischemic heart disease].
results.text_hl: The use of carvidolol as well as @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive disease@@@ associated with @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@ischemic heart disease@@@ resulted in sufficient @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotensive@@@ and antianginal effects, although @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on carvidolol have expereinced more favorable hemodinamic changes in comparision with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, especially the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Adrenal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D000309 @@@heart insufficiency@@@.
